column1: The text describes a specific data practice that is not covered by our label scheme.
Data transfer between user and website/app is encrypted, e.g., SSL, TLS, HTTPS.
You can opt out (by contacting the company) from the use of contact information by the site, which uses it for marketing purposes.
The text introduces the policy, a section, or a group of practices, but it does not mention a specific practice.
The text describes how to contact the company with questions, concerns, or complaints about the privacy policy.
Data is stored securely, e.g. in an encrypted format or database.
A named third party does collect on the first party website or app your activities on the website or app for targeted advertising. The data is aggregated or anonymized.
A specific security measure not covered above.
An unnamed third party does receive unspecified information about you for targeted advertising.
An unnamed third party does receive your contact information for targeted advertising. The data is personally identifiable.
An unnamed third party does receive information about you not covered by our label scheme for targeted advertising.
You can opt out (via a link) from the use of generic personal information by the site, which uses it for advertising.
The site collects your contact information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens on the website.
An unnamed third party does receive unspecified information about you for targeted advertising. The data is personally identifiable.
The policy makes generic security statements, e.g., "we protect your data" or "we use technology/encryption to protect your data".
A named third party does receive your contact information for targeted advertising.
You can opt out (by contacting the company) from the use of unspecified information by the site, which uses it for marketing purposes.
A named third party does receive information about you not covered by our label scheme for targeted advertising.
The site collects your contact information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information in an unspecified way.
You can make a choice about your privacy not described by our label scheme the use of unspecified information by an unspecified party for advertising.
A named third party does track on the first party website or app your unspecified personal information for targeted advertising. The data is aggregated or anonymized.
Data is accessible to employees/third parties on a need-to-know basis.
An unnamed third party does receive your activities on the website or app for targeted advertising.
A named third party does receive your activities on the website or app for targeted advertising. The data is aggregated or anonymized.
The site collects your generic personal information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens when you explicitly provide information in an unspecified way.
The site collects your generic personal information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens in an unspecified way.
The site collects your contact information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens in an unspecified way.
A named third party does receive your contact information for targeted advertising. The data is aggregated or anonymized.
A named third party does receive information about you not covered by our label scheme for targeted advertising. The data is aggregated or anonymized.
A named third party does collect on the first party website or app your cookies or tracking elements for targeted advertising. The data is aggregated or anonymized.
You can opt out (via a link) from the use of unspecified information by a third party, which uses it for advertising.
